thread.title: European shares climb as Glencore, Arcelor lift mining stocks

title: European shares climb as Glencore, Arcelor lift mining stocks
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
LONDON, Oct 5 (Reuters) - European shares rose on Monday, with Glencore and ArcelorMittal pushing up mining stocks and French economic data ...
